description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Rectangle Battle is an oldschool space-shooter with a 2 player vs. mode. You can have fun by aiming at high scores in 1 player survival mode or enjoy a quick match with a friend. Beware the evil triangles ;)!
description.short: Rectangle Battle is an oldschool space-shooter with a 2 player vs. mode. You can have fun by aiming at high scores in 1 player survival mode or enjoy a quick match with a friend. Beware the evil triangles ;)!
